long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Super Snake 3D for Chrome Extension is an exciting hypercasual game that offers a colorful 3D twist to the classic snake game. In this version, players must navigate the snake through a 3D environment to collect scattered food items. The objective is to gather as much food as possible while avoiding collisions with walls or the snake's own tail.

Careful maneuvering is essential as any impact will result in the game ending. As you collect food, your snake grows longer, covering a wider surface area on the map. This adds an extra layer of challenge as you must skillfully navigate to prevent the snake from colliding with its own tail.

The more food you collect, the higher your score will be. Aim to gather as much food as possible to achieve a remarkable score. The ultimate goal is to keep your snake alive for as long as possible, showcasing your agility and strategic thinking.

"Super Snake 3D" for Chrome Extension can be played for free on the website https://googlesnake.org/. Immerse yourself in this vibrant and addictive 3D version of the snake game, collect food, and challenge yourself to set new high scores. Enjoy the immersive gameplay and embark on an exciting journey with the super snake.

Note: If you want play more games please click on "More Games" or you can find on our website is: https://googlesnake.org/ Thanks!
